    [e][h]Version 7.21
    Version Information
    Release Date:
    2019-01-29
    Highlights
    • Balance Changes
    • Primary attribute bonuses removed
    • Io reworked and removed from Captains Mode
    Chronology
     
     V7.20e
    V7.21b

    General[edit]

    Creeps[edit]

    • Melee creeps average gold bounty reduced by 3
    • Range creeps upgrade cycle gold bounty increased from +3 to +6

    Neutrals[edit]

    • Replaced the primary jungle ancient camps with big camps

    Attributes[edit]

    • Heroes no longer gain 25% more benefit from their primary attributes (affects attributes from both items and the hero)
    • All heroes have primary attribute growth values increased by 15%
    • Health per strength increased from 18 to 20

    XP[edit]

    • XP required to reach level 7➜12 changed from 640/660/680/800/820/840 to 720/750/780/810/840/870
      • (The difference is +80/90/100/10/20/30 XP)

    Movement Speed[edit]

    • The following melee heroes now have +5 movement speed:
      • Naga Siren
      • Underlord
      • Monkey King
      • Nyx Assassin
      • Bloodseeker
      • Riki
    • The following melee heroes now have +10 movement speed:
      • Alchemist
      • Dragon Knight
      • Meepo
    • The following melee heroes now have +15 movement speed:
      • Legion Commander
      • Lifestealer
      • Lycan
      • Sven
      • Ursa
      • Wraith King
    • Ranged heroes with 295 movement speed and above now have 5 less movement speed

    Buildings[edit]

    • Tier 2 tower armor increased from 14 to 15
    • Tier 3 tower armor increased from 14 to 16
    • Melee Barracks armor increased from 13 to 15
    • Tower Protection armor bonus for Tier 2/3/4 increased from 3 to 4

    Items[edit]

    Animal Courier[edit]

    • Flying movement speed increased from 460 to 470

    Aeon Disk[edit]

    • Active status resistance increased from 50% to 75%
    • Recipe cost reduced from 1350 to 1250

    Battle Fury[edit]

    • Percentage damage bonus against non-hero units changed to be a fixed amount matching Quelling Blade

    Bloodstone[edit]

    • Bloodpact changed from 60% of current mana to 30% of max mana

    Bloodthorn[edit]

    • Cooldown reduced from 18 to 15

    Boots of Travel[edit]

    • Level 2 movement speed increased from +32% to +35%

    Buckler[edit]

    • Activated armor bonus duration on heroes reduced from 25 to 15 (carries through to Mekansm)

    Crimson Guard[edit]

    • Recipe cost increased from 600 to 750

    Drum of Endurance[edit]

    • Passive changed from a 6% movement speed aura to +20 movement speed to yourself only

    Ethereal Blade[edit]

    • Enemy debuff duration increased from 3 to 4 (matching duration when cast on allies)

    Eul's Scepter of Divinity[edit]

    • Movement speed bonus changed from +6% percentage to +20 flat

    Holy Locket[edit]

    • Now uses Energy Booster instead of a Void Stone (provides +325 Mana)

    Iron Branch[edit]

    • Cast range increased from 200 to 400

    Manta Style[edit]

    • Movement speed bonus reduced from +25 to +20

    Mask of Madness[edit]

    • Lifesteal increased from 15% to 20%

    Mekansm[edit]

    • Stack limit is now tied to cooldown on cast (like Guardian Greaves and Crimson Guard stack mechanics)

    Meteor Hammer[edit]

    • Radius increased from 300 to 315

    Necronomicon[edit]

    • Last Will damage increased from 550/675/800 to 600/700/800

    Nullifier[edit]

    • Duration increased from 5 to 6

    Phase Boots[edit]

    • Recipe changed from Gloves of Haste to Blades of Attack
    • Armor bonus increased from 5 to 6
    • Now gives +18 damage on melee (and +12 on range) instead of +20 attack speed
    • Melee active speed increased from 20% to 22%

    Power Treads[edit]

    • Recipe changed from Blades of Attack to Gloves of Haste
    • Attribute bonus reduced from 14 to 10
    • Now gives +20 attack speed instead of +12 damage

    Sange and Yasha[edit]

    • Movement speed bonus reduced from +35 to +30

    Solar Crest[edit]

    • Movement speed bonus changed from +6% percentage to +20 flat

    Spirit Vessel[edit]

    • Damage as a percentage of current health increased from 4.5% to 5%
    • Movement speed bonus changed from +6% percentage to +20 flat

    Tranquil Boots[edit]

    • Active form movement speed increased from 24% to 26%
    • Disabled form movement speed reduced from 20% to 18%

    Vladmir's offering[edit]

    • No longer uses Headdress nor provides its hp regen/stats
    • Now requires a 525 gold recipe

    Wind lace[edit]

    • Movement speed bonus changed from +6% percentage to +20 flat

    Yasha[edit]

    • Movement speed bonus reduced from +25 to +20

    Yasha and Kaya[edit]

    • Movement speed bonus reduced from +35 to +30

    Heroes[edit]

    Abaddon[edit]

    • Curse of Avernus curse duration increased from 4 to 4.5
    • Aphotic Shield mana cost reduced from 115 to 100/105/110/115

    Alchemist[edit]

    • Base movement speed increased by 10
    • Base agility increased from 16 to 22
    • Chemical Rage base attack time improved from 1.3/1.15/1 to 1.2/1.1/1
    • Level 10 Talent reduced from -8s Unstable Concoction to -7s
    • Level 20 Talent Concoction talent now adds the damage to the max instead of the base

    Ancient Apparition[edit]

    • Chilling Touch damage increased from 50/85/120/155 to 50/90/130/170
    • Ice Vortex mana cost reduced from 65/80/95/110 to 50/70/90/110
    • Level 25 Talent reduced from 900 AoE Cold Feet to 700
    • Level 25 Talent increased from +4% Ice Blast Kill Threshold to +5%

    Anti-Mage[edit]

    • Fixed Counterspell providing double magic resistance when the shield is active

    Arc Warden[edit]

    • Spark Wraith damage increased from 100/160/220/280 to 100/170/240/310
    • Tempest Double duration increased from 14/16/18 to 16/18/20
    • Level 10 Talent increased from +25 Attack Speed to +30

    Bane[edit]

    • Enfeeble attack speed slow increased from 40/60/80/100 to 50/75/100/125
    • Enfeeble mana cost reduced from 70/90/110/130 to 50/75/100/125
    • Level 10 Talent increased from +6 Armor to +7
    • Fiend's Grip duration increased from 5 to 6

    Batrider[edit]

    • Firefly now grants a 4/7/10/13% movement speed bonus
    • Firefly duration reduced from 18 to 15
    • Firefly cooldown reduced from 40 to 34

    Beastmaster[edit]

    • Inner Beast attack speed reduced from 15/25/35/45 to 10/20/30/40
    • Hawk health reduced from 300/450/600/750 to 150/200/250/300
    • Level 15 Talent changed from +40 Boar Damage to +65 Wild Axes Damage
    • Level 20 Talent changed from +80 Wild Axes Damage to +50 Boar Damage
    • Level 25 Talent increased from -15s Hawks Cooldown to -20s
    • Level 25 Talent reduced from +30 Inner Beast Attack Speed to +25

    Bloodseeker[edit]

    • Base movement speed increased by 5

    Bounty Hunter[edit]

    • Shuriken Toss cooldown reduced from 10 to 9
    • Jinada gold steal increased from 12/18/24/30 to 12/20/28/36
    • Track critical strike damage increased from 140/160/180% to 140/170/200%

    Brewmaster[edit]

    • Drunken Brawler critical strike reduced from 170/200/230/260% to 140/180/220/260%
    • Cinder Brew duration reduced from 7 to 5
    • Cinder Brew duration is refreshed on ignition
    • Cinder Brew ignite DPS increased from 20/25/30/35 to 20/30/40/50
    • Level 10 Talent reduced from +20 Damage to +15

    Bristleback[edit]

    • Viscous Nasal Goo mana cost reduced from 25 to 12/16/20/24

    Broodmother[edit]

    • Level 10 Talent increased from +75 Spawn Spiderlings Damage to +125
    • Level 15 Talent changed from +35% XP Gain to +15 Agility
    • Level 20 Talent increased from +20 Spiders Attack Damage to +30
    • Level 25 Talent increased from +350 Spiders Health to +450

    Centaur Warrunner[edit]

    • Retaliate no longer gains charges while it is active

    Chaos Knight[edit]

    • Chaos Strike cooldown reduced from 7/6/5/4 to 4
    • Chaos Strike lifesteal reduced from 50/55/60/65% to 40/50/60/70%
    • Chaos Strike max damage increased from 160/190/220/250% to 160/195/230/265%
    • Reality Rift slow duration increased from 2 to 3
    • Reality Rift slow reduced from 15/25/35/45% to 10/20/30/40%

    Chen[edit]

    • Divine Favor bonus damage reduced from 10/20/40/80 to 12/24/36/48
    • Divine Favor now provides double bonus damage on non-hero units
    • Divine Favor duration increased from 12 to 14
    • Divine Favor mana cost reduced from 110 to 70/80/90/100
    • Hand of God heal increased from 250/400/550 to 300/450/600
    • Level 15 Talent reduced from -10s Divine Favor Cooldown to -7s
    • Level 25 Talent reduced from +400 Hand of God Heal to +350
    • Level 25 Talent increased from +4 Holy Persuasion Max Units to +5

    Clinkz[edit]

    • Level 15 Talent changed from +20% Evasion to +15 Strength

    Clockwerk[edit]

    • Battery Assault cast point removed
    • Rocket Flare mana cost reduced from 50 to 35/40/45/50
    • Level 20 Talent changed from +20% Magic Resistance to Rocket Flare True Sight
    • Level 25 Talent changed from Rocket Flare True Sight to +50% Magic Resistance

    Crystal Maiden[edit]

    • Freezing Field now grants you 10 bonus armor while channeling
    • Arcane Aura allied mana regen reduced from 1.2/1.7/2.2/2.7 to 1/1.5/2/2.5
    • Arcane Aura self mana regen increased from 2.4/4.4/6.4/8.4 to 2.5/4.5/6.5/8.5

    Dark Willow[edit]

    • Bramble Maze mana cost reduced from 140/150/160/170 to 100/120/140/160
    • Bramble Maze cooldown reduced from 34/31/28/25 to 25

    Dazzle[edit]

    • Poison Touch mana cost increased from 95/110/125/140 to 110/120/130/140
    • Shadow Wave cast range reduced from 900 to 800

    Death Prophet[edit]

    • Base damage increased by 3

    Disruptor[edit]

    • Base armor increased by 1

    Doom[edit]

    • Scorched Earth cooldown reduced from 55/50/45/40 to 50/45/40/35
    • Devour health regen from 4/8/13/18 to 3/8/13/18

    Dragon Knight[edit]

    • Base movement speed increased by 10
    • Dragon Blood health regen increased from 4/7/10/13 to 4/8/12/16
    • Elder Dragon Form frost attack slow increased from -20 to -30
    • Level 20 Talent changed from 2× Dragon Blood to +25 Strength
    • Level 25 Talent changed from +40 Strength to 2× Dragon Blood

    Drow Ranger[edit]

    • Level 15 Talent changed from +25 Attack Speed to +10 Agility

    Earthshaker[edit]

    • Fissure mana cost reduced from 125/140/155/170 to 110/130/150/170

    Earth Spirit[edit]

    • Rolling Boulder damage reduced from 100 to 70/80/90/100
    • Boulder Smash slow reduced from 80% to 60%
    • Level 15 Talent reduced from +200 Rolling Boulder Damage to +150

    Elder Titan[edit]

    • Level 10 Talent reduced from +25 Movement Speed to +20

    Ember Spirit[edit]

    • Sleight of Fist cooldown reduced from 30/22/14/6 to 18/14/10/6
    • Base damage increased by 3

    Enchantress[edit]

    • Enchant cooldown reduced from 55/40/25/10 to 22/18/14/10
    • Enchant creep duration reduced from 50/60/70/80 to 26/44/62/80
    • Enchant mana cost reduced from 65 to 40/50/60/70

    Enigma[edit]

    • Midnight Pulse mana cost rescaled from 75/95/115/135 to 50/80/110/140

    Faceless Void[edit]

    • Time Dilation AoE increased from 725 to 775
    • Level 10 Talent increased from +8 Strength to +10
    • Level 15 Talent changed from +300 Health to -1s Time Walk Cooldown

    Grimstroke[edit]

    • Phantom's Embrace rend damage reduced from 120/200/280/360 to 75/150/225/300
    • Ink Swell mana cost increased from 90/100/110/120 to 120/130/140/150
    • Ink Swell movement speed reduced from 18% to 12/14/16/18%

    Gyrocopter[edit]

    • Base strength increased from 19 to 22

    Huskar[edit]

    • Attack point reduced from 0.4 to 0.3
    • Berserker's Blood max attack speed reduced from 220/260/300/340 to 160/220/280/340
    • Life Break damage and cost reduced from 34/39/44% to 32/38/44%
    • Level 15 Talent reduced from +15 Burning Spear DPS to +10

    Invoker[edit]

    • Base damage increased by 3
    • Exort bonus damage reduced from 4➜28 to 3➜27 per instance
    • Level 10 Talent changed from +1.25s Tornado Lift Time to -30s Ghost Walk Cooldown

    Io[edit]

    • Temporarily removed from Captains Mode
    • Tether now transfers health and mana even when Io is at max hp/mp
    • Overcharge now has an 18 second cooldown and an 8 second duration
      • No longer has a 2 second toggle
    • Overcharge now costs 40/60/80/100 mana to cast
      • No longer cost 6% of health and mana per second
    • Overcharge attack speed bonus increased from 40/50/60/70 to 50/80/110/140
    • Overcharge damage reduction increased from 5/10/15/20% to 15/20/25/30%
    • Relocate delay increased from 2.7/2.35/2 to 3.5/3.25/3
    • Relocate cooldown reduced from 130/110/90 to 90/75/60
    • Relocate is now cast delay again instead of channeling (being interrupted, silenced, rooted, etc will cancel the ability)
    • Level 25 Talent changed from -60s Relocate Cooldown to -30s

    Jakiro[edit]

    • Level 10 Talent changed from +30% XP Gain to +300 Attack Range
    • Level 15 Talent changed from +300 Attack Range to +40% XP Gain

    Juggernaut[edit]

    • Base armor reduced by 1
    • Omnislash no longer allows you to teleport while using it
    • Healing Ward movement speed reduced from 420 to 400
    • Omnislash cooldown increased from 130/120/110 to 130
    • Level 15 Talent changed from +1s Blade Fury to +50 Blade Fury Movement Speed

    Keeper of the Light[edit]

    • Level 10 Talent changed from 8% Spell Lifesteal to +30% XP Gain
    • Level 15 Talent changed from +30% XP Gain to +1 Will-O-Wisp Health Count

    Kunkka[edit]

    • Level 25 Talent changed from -1.5s Tidebringer Cooldown to +60% Tidebringer Cleave

    Legion Commander[edit]

    • Base movement speed increased by 15
    • Level 20 Talent reduced from +40 Movement Speed to +35
    • Level 25 Talent changed from -10s Press The Attack Cooldown to 350 AoE Press The Attack

    Leshrac[edit]

    • Diabolic Edict increased from 9/18/27/36 to 11/22/33/44
    • Level 25 Talent reduced from +50 Diabolic Edict Explosions to +40

    Lich[edit]

    • Frost Shield slow reduced from 35% to 20/25/30/35%
    • Chain Frost damage reduced from 300/400/500 to 250/375/500
    • Level 25 Talent increased from +40% slow to +50%

    Lifestealer[edit]

    • Base movement speed increased by 15
    • Base armor increased by 2
    • Level 15 Talent reduced from +30 Movement Speed to +25

    Lina[edit]

    • Base damage increased by 3

    Lion[edit]

    • Level 10 Talent increased from +75 Cast Range to +100
    • Level 15 Talent increased from +120 Gold/Min to +150

    Lone Druid[edit]

    • Spirit Bear movement speed increased from 340/355/370/385 to 340/360/380/400
    • Spirit Bear attack damage increased from 35/50/65/80 to 35/55/75/95
    • Level 20 Talent changed from -0.3 Spirit Bear Attack Time to 0 Entangle Cooldown
    • Level 25 Talent changed from 0 Entangle Cooldown to -0.5s Spirit Bear Attack Time

    Luna[edit]

    • Luna: Level 10 Talent increased from +200 Cast Range to +300

    Lycan[edit]

    • Base movement speed increased by 15
    • Wolves armor reduced from 1 to 0
    • Wolves magic resistance reduced from 80% to 70%
    • Wolves health increased from 230/260/290/320 to 300/350/400/450
    • Howl health regen increased from 4/6/8/10 to 4/8/12/16

    Medusa[edit]

    • Fixed Mystic Snake bouncing to Spell Immune enemies
    • Level 10 Talent reduced from +20 Damage to +15
    • Level 15 Talent reduced from +35% Mystic Snake Mana Steal to +30%
    • Level 20 Talent changed from +700 Mana to -4s Mystic Snake Cooldown
    • Level 25 Talent changed from +7 Split Shot Targets to +1000 Mana

    Meepo[edit]

    • Base movement speed increased by 10

    Mirana[edit]

    • Sacred Arrow movement speed increased from 857 to 950

    Monkey King[edit]

    • Base movement speed increased by 5
    • Wukong's Command attack rate improved from 1.3 to 1.2

    Morphling[edit]

    • Strength gain increased from 2.3 to 2.6
    • Level 10 Talent increased from +15s Morph Duration to +20s

    Naga Siren[edit]

    • Base movement speed increased by 5
    • Mirror Image duration from 24 to 26
    • Mirror Image damage taken reduced from 475/450/425/400% to 400%
    • Level 20 Talent increased from -5s Ensnare Cooldown to -7s

    Nature's Prophet[edit]

    • Using Tango on a Sprout tree will provide 2× regen (like eating a branch tree)
    • Level 20 Talent changed from -4s Sprout Cooldown to +25% Cooldown Reduction

    Necrophos[edit]

    • Death Pulse damage increased from 100/140/180/220 to 100/150/200/250
    • Level 15 Talent increased from +20% Ghost Shroud Slow to +30%

    Night Stalker[edit]

    • Hunter in the Night movement speed bonus increased from 20/25/30/35 to 22/28/34/40%
    • Removed Scepter
    • Dark Ascension now provides full unobstructed vision, instead of only 900 range
    • Level 15 Talent changed from +150 Cast Range to +15% Lifesteal

    Nyx Assassin[edit]

    • Base movement speed increased by 5
    • Strength gain increased from 2.3 to 2.5
    • Level 10 Talent increased from +60 GPM to +90
    • Level 10 Talent increased from +6% Spell Amp to +8%

    Ogre Magi[edit]

    • Fireblast cooldown reduced from 12/11/10/9 to 11/10/9/8
    • Multicast 2× chance increased from 60% to 70%

    Omniknight[edit]

    • Heavenly Grace status resistance reduced from 50/60/70/80% to 50%
    • Heavenly Grace duration increased from 8 to 10
    • Heavenly Grace now provides 7/14/21/28 bonus strength
    • Heavenly Grace mana cost increased from 75 to 80/90/100/110

    Outworld Devourer[edit]

    • Sanity's Eclipse multiplier from 9/10/11 to 8/9/10
    • Level 15 Talent reduced from +30 Movement Speed to +25

    Pangolier[edit]

    • Base damage increased by 4
    • Level 10 Talent changed from +20 Movement Speed to +300 Swashbuckle Slash Range

    Phantom Assassin[edit]

    • Rearranged Level 15 Talents - +25% Cleave vs +15% Lifesteal
    • Rearranged Level 20 Talents - +20% Blur Evasion vs -4 Armor Corruption
    • Rearranged Level 25 Talents - +5% Coup de Grace vs Triple Strike Stifling Dagger

    Phantom Lancer[edit]

    • Level 10 Talent increased from +10% Evasion to +15%
    • Level 20 Talent increased from +4 Max Juxtapose Illusions to +5

    Phoenix[edit]

    • Sun Ray can no longer move forward while rooted

    Pudge[edit]

    • Base damage increased by 6

    Queen of Pain[edit]

    • Storm Hammer damage reduced from 100/175/250/325 to 80/160/240/320

    • Meld debuff is now applied before the attack damage is reduced by armor

    • Level 15 Talent changed from +7 Armor to +25 Movement Speed

    • Whirling Death tree bonus damage increased from 10/15/20/25 to 12/18/24/30
